title: English Conversation Practice on Science Topics in a 3D Virtual Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversational Skills and Understanding of Elementary Science Concepts
context.additional_context: English conversation practice and peer feedback activities on science topics using smartphone-based 3D virtual environments (Gather.town or similar platforms)

learning_goals: Learners can use at least five English conversational expressions related to explaining scientific experiment procedures in 3D virtual environments.
Learners can communicate continuously in English for over three minutes during collaborative scientific topic discussions with peer avatars.
Learners can produce a 3-minute presentation video explaining scientific concepts in English for project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
